title: Leading industries targeted by DDoS attack traffic 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Percentage of attack traffic in the y axis.
The Percentage of attack traffic is highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
The maximum Industry Gaming has got 79.0 times higher Percentage of attack traffic than the minimum Industry Media and entertainment.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of attack traffic for 8 number of Industrys.
The Percentage of attack traffic is highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Percentage of attack traffic in the y axis.
The Percentage of attack traffic is highest at Industry Gaming and lowest at Industry Media and entertainment.
The maximum Industry Gaming has got 79.0 times higher Percentage of attack traffic than the minimum Industry Media and entertainment.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Percentage of attack traffic in the y axis.
Industry Gaming has the highest Percentage of attack traffic and Media and entertainment has the lowest Percentage of attack traffic.
The second highest Percentage of attack traffic is appeared to be the Industry Internet and telecom.
There is a difference of 78.0 between the maximum Industry Gaming and minimum Industry Media and entertainment.
Industry Gaming is higher than any other Industrys with value 79.0, followed by Internet and telecom, and Software and technology. Down to Industry Media and entertainment with the lowest value 1.0.
Industry Financial services, and Software and technology have a similar Percentage of attack traffic that is 4.0.
Considered together, the average Percentage of attack traffic in all 8 Industrys is roughly 12.62.
Summing up the values of all Industrys, we get total 101.0.
